document.full_text: palestinians are not seeking to isolate israel on the international stage, but will pursue their unilateral drive for u.n. recognition of statehood unless peace talks resume, president mahmoud abbas said on friday.
document.title: palestinians have no wish to isolate israel: abbas
lines_and_colors: palestinians are not seeking to isolate israel on the international stage, but will pursue their unilateral drive for u.n. recognition of statehood unless peace talks resume, president mahmoud abbas said on friday.
